summary: Diff implements task edit dialog state initialization/population for edit mode and introduces explicit clientName/assignedName sort support via a shared sort utility and Tasks page wiring. Diff also adds unrelated router/search validation and startup/error-handling changes, plus URL param utilities and an Assignees route/nav not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added defensive TanStack Router search validation for /tasks and startup error boundary/error screens behavior not requested by REQ-57/REQ-58.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to fix task edit flow and sorting; it does not request router-level validation or startup error handling changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/modified URL parameter persistence and hash cleanup utilities unrelated to task edit flow or sorting.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention URL param persistence/cleanup beyond the tasks edit/sort fixes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/connected an Assignees page route (and referenced nav item in summaries) beyond the requested sorting behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-58 requires assignee-wise sorting in Tasks page UI, not adding a dedicated Assignees route/page.
